mapper.insert: insert into todolist (CARD_SEQ, USER_ID, CARD_NAME, LIST_NUM, CARD_DATE, CARD_TAXIS) values ( CARD_SEQ.nextval, #{userId}, #{cardName}, #{listNum}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, ( select coalesce(max(card_taxis), 0) + 1 from todolist where list_num = #{listNum} ))
mapper.select: SELECT CARD_SEQ AS CARDNUM, CARD_NAME, l.LIST_NUM, CARD_TAXIS, l.LIST_NAME FROM TODOLIST t JOIN LIST l ON t.LIST_NUM = l.LIST_NUM JOIN MEMBER m on m.USER_ID = t.USER_ID ORDER BY CARD_TAXIS ASC
mapper.update: update todolist set card_name = #{cardName} where card_seq = #{cardNum}
update todolist set list_num = #{listNum}, card_taxis = ( select coalesce(max(card_taxis), 0) + 1 from todolist where list_num = #{listNum}) where card_seq = #{cardNum}
